thread.title: Watch our documentary about the staggering rate of maternal mortality for black women
thread.title_full: Watch our documentary about the staggering rate of maternal mortality for black women

author: Fusion
title: Watch our documentary about the staggering rate of maternal mortality for black women
text: Copy Link http://fus.in/2mkw7x9 Embed Code <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://player.ooyala.com/tframe.html?embedCode=x1M2U1YTE6dLNfNa-DI4me6rICeNQine&pbid=6233f5fb56044b649b50dde3c5893e9d" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe> Fusion TV marks International Women’s Day with Death by Delivery , a searing portrait of the cost of racism in America. See what Fusion’s Nelufar Hedayat found while reporting on this systemic problem affecting black women across the country. The full documentary airs March 8 at 9 PM on Fusion.
